verses.roman:
gopī-dvāre lakṣmī kare kṛṣṇa-saṅgāsvāda
īśvaratve bheda mānile haya aparādha

synonyms: gopī-dvāre—through the gopīs; lakṣmī—the goddess of fortune; kare—does; kṛṣṇa-saṅga-āsvāda—tasting the sweetness of the association of Lord Kṛṣṇa; īśvaratve—in the Supreme Personality of Godhead; bheda—difference; mānile—if one considers; haya—there is; aparādha—offense.
translation: "The goddess of fortune enjoys the association of Kṛṣṇa through the gopīs. One should not see a difference between the forms of the Lord, for such a conception is offensive.
